title: Guardian-01 Action Contract v1 (Frozen)
description: Deterministic, non-learning, downhill-only execution contract. Any violation results in veto.

actions.description: Ordered list of execution proposals. No branching or loops.

type.description: Closed action set. This enum may only shrink in future versions.

params.description: Bounded parameters only. No inferred or adaptive values.

target.description: Canonical identifier only. No expressions or references.

duration_s.description: Hard upper bound. Cannot be extended.

speed_mps.description: Absolute safety ceiling. Cannot be overridden.

force_n.description: Absolute force limit. No escalation permitted.

utterance.description: Human-facing speech only. No commands, no reasoning.
